navigator.is_offline: Locker is currently in offline mode.

alert.enterprise_lock: The account is locked by the enterprise. Please contact your enterprise admin to unblock account.
alert.enterprise_system_lock: The account is locked because the Enterprise plan is expired. Please contact your enterprise admin to unblock account.

update.title: Update App?
update.content: A new version of Locker is available! Click to update Locker version {{version}}.

error.not_valid_for_biometric: Log in with Password to re-enable FaceID/TouchID
error.biometric_not_enable: Face ID/Touch ID unlocking is not enabled
error.biometric_not_support: Face ID/Touch ID unlocking is not supported
error.session_login_failed: Session login failed! Please try again
error.account_not_activated: This account is not activated yet! Please check your email and follow the instructions (we will resend after 1 day).
error.no_associated_account: There's no account associated with this email or username. Try another or create a new account.
error.invalid_authorization_code: The authorization code is not valid
error.forbidden: Your account doesn't have permission to perform this action
error.no_team_available: Nothing here. Join a team with the role Manager to start sharing items.
error.no_collection_available: You don't have access to any team folder.
error.not_available_offline: This action is unavailable in offline mode
error.login_locked: You have been locked from accessing your account due to the team's policy. Please try again after:
error.duplicate_cipher_name: Duplicated item name! Please choose another name!
error.duplicate_folder_name: Duplicated folder name! Please choose another name!
error.not_allowed_to_see_pw: Cannot perform this action! This password can only be used in Auto-fill service!
error.not_allowed_to_copy_pw: Cannot perform this action! This password can only be used in Auto-fill service!
error.not_available_for_free: This feature is not available for free account!
error.could_not_complete: The operation couldn't be completed. Please try again

social_login.cannot_get_email: Cannot retrieve public email from this account

apple.could_not_complete: The operation couldn't be completed. Please try again

google.play_service_not_available: Google Play services are not available or outdated

github.token_refresh_failed: Could not exchange the refresh token. Please try again
github.browser_not_found: Browser not found! Please install a suitable browser
github.service_configuration_fetch_error: Could not fetch the service configuration. Please try again

error.cannot_update_more_at_once: Cannot update more than {{count}} items at once
error.rooted_device: The operating system on your devices has been modified in an unauthorized way, therefore it is not compatible with this application.
error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to the server. Please check your internet connection
error.network_error: Network error. Your connection is not secure
error.share_folder_move_item: This item is being shared. Stop sharing and try again
error.onpremise_login_failed: Your email doesn’t belong to any Enterprise. Please try again

success.invitation_accepted: Invitation accepted. Please wait for the admin confirmation
success.biometric_enabled: Face ID/Touch ID unlocking is enabled
success.share_invitaion_accepted: Done! The shared item will be decrypted shortly
success.will_sync_when_online: Your data will be synced when there is an internet connection

emergency_access.title: Emergency Access
emergency_access.des: This feature grants other Locker account owner(s) the ability to access to your vault in some emergency situations
emergency_access.label: {{pending}} pending requests
emergency_access.rq_noti: Are you sure you want to request emergency access? You will be provided access after {{waitTime}} day(s) or whenever the user manually approves the request

add.view: View: They can view all your vault items
add.takeover: Takeover: They can reset your Password
add.text: Time required before automatically granting access.

emergency_access.view_user_vault: You are now viewing {{name}}'s vault items

policy.password_composition: Password must contain at least 1 special character
policy.avoid_ambiguous: Avoid ambiguous characters (O vs 0, l vs I, etc)

password_violation_modal.title: Policy violated
password_violation_modal.desc: Your password violated the following policies of

create_master_pass.title: Create Password
create_master_pass.desc: Password is your Locker unlock password. This is the only password you need to remember to access all other passwords stored in Locker. Please do not share this password with anyone.
create_master_pass.note: Note: Locker cannot view, store, or re-issue Password in case you forget or lose it.

confirm_create_master_pass.title: Important
confirm_create_master_pass.desc: By processing, you understand that Locker CANNOT see, retrieve, or re-issue your Password in case you forget it. Your Password is only yours to keep.
confirm_create_master_pass.link: You can learn more about Password here.
confirm_create_master_pass.back_btn: Go back, I want to change my Password

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.desc: Your vault is protected with world-class security.

sync.title: Unlimited Sync
sync.desc: You can access your Locker's data from any devices.

autofill.title: Auto-fill
autofill.desc: Fill your credentials automatically across applications and websites.

otp.title: In-app OTP
otp.desc: Increase your account security with OTP integrated in Locker.

lock.master_pass_changed: Master password changed. Please login using new password
lock.hint_sent: Password hint sent. Please check your email for instructions
lock.title: Welcome Back!
lock.desc: Enter your Password to Log In

login.title: Sign in to your account
login.from_authenticator: Please use your authentication app (such as Duo or Google Authenticator) to get the code.
login.from_email: An email has been sent to {{email}}. Check you inbox/spam to get the verification code.

forgot_password.title: Forgot Password ?
forgot_password.username_or_email: Enter your username or email address
forgot_password.enter_code_desc: We have sent you an email. Check you inbox/spam to get the verification code.
forgot_password.resend_success: Resend verification code successfully! Please check your email.
forgot_password.password_updated: Your password has been updated. Please login using the new password.

signup.title: Sign up for a free account
signup.subscribe_desc: Please keep me updated on news, events and offers
signup.signup_successful: A confirmation email has been sent to your address (check your SPAM folder as well)

biometric_intro.title: Unlock your vault with Face ID/Touch ID
biometric_intro.desc: Use face recognition or fingerprint to protect your passwords
biometric_intro.suggest: Use Face ID/Touch ID to easy unlock your vault

empty.title: Quick & convenient shopping
empty.desc: Add payment card details to autofill when shopping online

folder.folder_existed: A folder with this name has already existed

delete_modal.title: Delete Folder
delete_modal.desc: After folder deleted, all items will be moved to trash. Are you sure you want to delete the folder?

empty.title: Organize items in Folder
empty.desc: Keep passwords and other items in groups

empty.title: Fill out online forms
empty.desc: Save your address and contact details to fill out registration forms quickly

password.master_password_note: This is your Locker Password. It will change accordingly as you change your Password. We created this item for you so you don't forget your Password. Don't worry, this operation happens within your device and we still can't see or edit your Password from our server. Have fun using Locker.

empty.title: Forget password resets
empty.desc: Add your passwords and access them on any device, anytime

share_folder.error_share_item: Folders with shared items can’t be shared. Remove or stop shared items and try again
share_folder.share_with: This item has been shared with
share_folder.no_shared_users: Hasn't been shared with any users yet

empty.title: Securely share items
empty.desc_share: Any shared passwords, notes or credit cards will appear here
empty.desc_shared: Any received passwords, notes or credit cards will appear here

shares.leave_desc: Are you sure you want to leave this share group?

confirm_share.verification_desc: To ensure the integrity of your encryption keys, please verify the user's fingerprint phrase before continuing.
confirm_share.fingerprint_desc: A 'fingerprint phrase' is a unique word phrase (similar to a passphrase) that a user can use to authenticate their public key with another user, for the purposes of sharing.

shares.confirm: A user has registered a Locker account via your sharing request. Please confirm your sharing request

trash.delete_desc: This item will be lost and you will no longer be able to restore it.
trash.to_trash_desc: This item will be moved to trash. Trash items will be permanently deleted after 30 days.
trash.perma_delete_desc: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this item?

empty.title: Empty trash
empty.desc: All items moved to Trash can be restored until you delete them permanently

empty.title: Add your first item
empty.desc: Create your first item to start building your vault
empty.desc_2: Create your first item to start building your vault

enable_autofill.title: Don’t miss a magic of autofill
enable_autofill.content: Let’s enable Autofill to see the magic of login

menu.invitation_desc: You've been invited to the {{org}} organization! Join now and start collaborating with your teammates.

authenticator.title: Authenticator
authenticator.desc: Generate two-factor authentication (2FA) codes on your device

empty.title: Secure your account
empty.desc: Add an additional layer of security when signing in

pass_health.title: Password Health
pass_health.desc: Identify passwords that can put you at risk

exposed_passwords.name: Exposed Passwords
exposed_passwords.desc: Passwords that have been uncovered in known data breaches

data_breach_scanner.title: Data Breach Scanner
data_breach_scanner.desc: Check if sensitive data is leaked online
data_breach_scanner.breach_desc: A "breach" is an incident where a site's data has been illegally accessed by hackers and then released publicly. Review the types of data that were compromised (email addresses, passwords, credit cards etc.) and take appropriate action, such as changing passwords.
data_breach_scanner.check_email: Check any email addresses that you use
data_breach_scanner.no_breaches_found: was not found in any known data breaches.

settings.deauthorize_sessions_desc: Concerned your account is logged in on another device? Proceed below to deauthorize all computers or devices that you have previously used. This security step is recommended if you previously used a public computer or accidentally saved your password on a device that isn't yours.
settings.deauthorize_sessions_warning: Proceeding will also log you out of your current session, requiring you to log back in.
settings.delete_account_warning: Proceed below to delete your account and all associated data.
settings.delete_account_success: Your Locker account has been deleted!
settings.delete_all_items_warning: Proceed below to delete all items and folders in your vault. Items that belong to an organization that you share with will not be deleted.

activated.title: Auto-fill activated!
activated.content: Now you can login to applications and websites faster

ios.desc: To enable password autofill on your device, follow these instructions:

other_permission.name_xiaomi: Display pop-up windows while running in the background
other_permission.desc: Enable this permission to allow Locker's autofill service to display the user interface for selecting credentials for the application.

android_autofill.name: Android Auto-fill
android_autofill.desc: The Locker auto-fill service uses the Android Autofill Framework to assist in filling logins into other apps on your device

import.success: Data imported! Your items will appear shortly
import.limited: Your Free Plan Storage is Limited

crypto_asset.choose_type_desc: Select the method that crypto you want to add

empty.title: Add your first crypto backup
empty.desc: Keep your crypto account/wallet in safe place

invite_member.info_upgrade: Upgrade to Family Plan and invite your friends joining Locker!
invite_member.confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this user from Family Plan?
invite_member.title: Add member to your Family Plan
invite_member.list_member_title: Member you added to the plan will appear at the list below

outdated_data.desc: Looks like you are trying to update an unsynchronized item. Please wait for the synchronization process to finish, or you can manually synchronize your data here

enterprise_invitation.invited: You are invited to Locker Business
enterprise_invitation.accept_note: If you accept this invitation, your account will be upgraded to Business User plan. Admins can perform certain actions to your account such as applying policies, locking, or disabling your account.
enterprise_invitation.decline_note: If you do not wish to join this organization, simply click “Decline”. You won’t be asked again.

enterprise_note.note: Don’t worry. You will still be able to use your personal vault. However, {{name}} can control certain aspects of your accounts, such as:
enterprise_note.note_3: Apply password policies to your account

enterprise_invitation.data: All your vault data remains the same. {{mame}} can’t see your data or your Password.
enterprise_invitation.request_access: You have to Request access from {{mame}} in order to continue using your Locker account.

onpremise_passwordless.title: Enter the OTP code below to your Locker Desktop app to log in. Make sure that you’ve already registered your account on Desktop app with a FIDO device.

instruction.label: Instruction
instruction.2: Click on your profile menu on the top right

onpremise_passwordless.point_camera: Point your camera to the QR Code on Desktop App to confirm Login

normal.dec: Share with Locker users or a group of users. They can view or edit your item.

quick.dec: Send a link of the item to anyone, they don't need a Locker account to view it.

quick_shares.title: Get shareable link

config.title: General access
config.email: Email addresses for the people to share this with
config.verify: They'll need to verify their email before they can access the item

quick_shares.expired: This item's share link will expire on {{time}}
